name: Overtuned
description:
Overtuned is a action platformer about switching modules to make the game get easier with a higher risk of a game over, developed for Gdevelop game jam 1, theme build/rebuild.

In Overtuned you will be rationing spare parts around between using them as lifes or as upgrades, everytime you die you lose a part, as well as everything equipped at the time.

CONTROLS
Z - Jump
X - Blaster (If you have it)
Left/Right - Move
Down - Pass through jump-through platforms
Up - Interact
